message: I think this is a fair split, considering I'm the one making the offer!  Let's be reasonable.
Let's split it a bit more evenly, I'm willing to compromise but I won't accept an unfair split!
Okay, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
Getting closer! I'm willing to give you a bit more than half, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Let's just split it evenly this time.  No more haggling!
